name: ðŸ§¬ Menu Item
description: Atomic component: Single navigation link used in Header and Footer menus. Supports localized labels and internal/external URLs.

fields.name: Internal Name
fields.helpText: Descriptive name for editors only (e.g., 'Main Nav - About', 'Footer - Privacy'). Not displayed on website

fields.name: Link Label

validations.message: Keep menu labels short for better navigation (max 30 characters)

fields.helpText: Text displayed in the menu (e.g., 'About', 'Blog', 'Contact'). Localized per language. Max 30 characters

fields.name: Destination URL

regexp.message: Enter a valid URL (e.g., '/about', 'https://example.com') or relative path

fields.helpText: Link destination. Use relative paths for internal pages (e.g., '/blog', '/about') or full URLs for external links

fields.name: Open in New Tab
fields.helpText: Enable for external links to open in a new browser tab. Typically used for external resources

fields.name: Optional Icon
fields.helpText: Optional icon identifier (e.g., 'home', 'mail', 'phone'). Frontend must support the icon library being used
